__e: I refuse to believe that love, any love, could be wrong.
You owe it to yourself, because I refuse to believe that Kyle can give you what I can.
I refuse to believe, in a world this big, that there's no place for us.
I merely declined to become involved in a mess that had nothing to do with me.
Young man, your father's death must hurt but I refuse to be incriminated by you.
-I refuse to be a one-man woman.
I refuse to believe that a woman like you, a lady, could give herself to a man without first being certain that he was the one.
Well, if that's all you want out of life, man, then God bless but I refuse to let your shit taint the rest of mine. No.
No, what I refuse to do is to be left in the dark, And it seems to me that's what's going on.
